name: Schickel, Appellant, v. Yellow Cab Company of Philadelphia

judges: Before Drew, C. J., Stern, Stearne, Ladner and Chidsey, JJ.
parties: Schickel, Appellant, v. Yellow Cab Company of Philadelphia.

opinions.text:
Opinion
Pee Curiam,
The order is affirmed on the opinion of the learned court below.
opinions.author: Pee Curiam,

casebody.head_matter:
Schickel, Appellant, v. Yellow Cab Company of Philadelphia.
Argued November 21, 1951.
Before Drew, C. J., Stern, Stearne, Ladner and Chidsey, JJ.
Samuel Kravitz, for appellant.
James J. Leyden, for appellee.
January 7, 1952:
